name.baseName: Aluminum ingot casting ; Primary aluminum ingot ; Liquid primary aluminum ; 2014
铝锭铸造 ; 原生铝锭 ; 液态原铝 ; 2014年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This dataset represents the process of aluminum ingot casting using liquid primary aluminum, specifically for the production of primary aluminum ingots. The material data is relevant for the manufacturing of aluminum products used across various industries such as aerospace, construction, packaging, and the automotive sector, as well as for electrical applications due to its high conductivity.
该数据集代表了使用液态原铝的铝锭铸造过程，专门用于生产原生铝锭。该材料数据与航空航天、建筑、包装和汽车行业中使用的铝制品的生产相关联，由于其高导电性，也用于电气应用。

technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset represents the process of aluminum ingot casting using liquid primary aluminum, specifically for the production of primary aluminum ingots. The material data is relevant for the manufacturing of aluminum products used across various industries such as aerospace, construction, packaging, and the automotive sector, as well as for electrical applications due to its high conductivity.
该数据集代表了使用液态原铝的铝锭铸造过程，专门用于生产原生铝锭。该材料数据与航空航天、建筑、包装和汽车行业中使用的铝制品的生产相关联，由于其高导电性，也用于电气应用。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.
本研究的数据参考了PA、SA、电力等背景数据的LCA数据。PA数据来自统计数据源，SA数据主要来自文献。背景数据主要来自中国科学院生态环境研究中心CASRCEES 2018建立的中国本地化LCA数据库，涵盖能源、材料、交通、废物管理等LCA数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this LCA dataset, it is important to consider the specific year of data collection (2014), as changes in technology or efficiency may have occurred since then. The dataset is sourced from statistical data for primary aluminum (PA), secondary aluminum (SA), and electricity usage along with other background data. For accurate results, the scope of the assessment should align with the geographical and technological context of the data source, refer to CAS RCEES 2018 for Chinese background data, and consider methodological differences when applying this dataset in a global context or in conjunction with data from other regions.
在使用此LCA数据集时，必须考虑数据收集的具体年份（2014年），因为自那以后技术或效率可能发生了变化。该数据集源自原铝（PA）、再生铝（SA）和电力使用情况以及其他背景数据的统计数据。为了获得准确的结果，评估的范围应与数据来源的地理和技术背景一致，并参考CAS RCEES 2018用于中国的背景数据，并在将此数据集应用于全球背景或与其他地区的数据结合使用时考虑方法论的差异。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
